name: smart-tree
description: A blazingly fast, AI-friendly directory tree visualization tool
long_description:
Smart Tree (st) is a powerful directory visualization tool that goes beyond traditional tree commands. It provides intelligent filtering, multiple output formats, and optimization for both human and AI consumption.

Features include:
- Multiple output formats (hex, json, csv, tsv, ai-optimized)
- Smart filtering by file type, size, date, and content
- Built-in compression for large outputs
- MCP server integration for AI assistants
- Blazingly fast performance with Rust implementation
